text: is a broadcasting station in Miyazaki Prefecture, Japan, and it is affiliated with Japan Radio Network (JRN), Japan News Network (JNN) and TBS Network. It is owned by the government of the prefecture, Mainichi Shimbun, the Bank of Miyazaki and various investors with fewers stocks. The name MRT comes from Miyazaki Radio and Television, the name was adopted in 1961 upon changing from RMK (Radio Miyazaki K.K.). ==Station== ===Radio=== *Fukuoka: 936 kHz JONF 5 kW; 90.4 MHz FM ===TV (Analog)=== *Fukuoka: Channel 10 JONF-TV *Nobeoka: Channel 6 *Iino: Channel 6 *Kushima: Channel 1 *Takachiho: Channel 5 ===TV (Digital)=== *Button 6 *Miyazaki: Channel 15 JONF-DTV == External links == * MRT宮崎放送 * miten * MRT宮崎放送 - YouTube * Category:Japan News Network Category:Television stations in Japan Category:Radio in Japan Category:Radio stations established in 1954 Category:Television channels and stations established in 1960 Category:Mass media in Miyazaki (city)
title: Miyazaki Broadcasting
